publisher.value: HL7 Orders and Observation Work Group

description.value: This value set includes all ICD-9CM and ICD-10CM concepts and is part of the of the The USLabOrder and USLabReport Implementation Guides. This content may not be published ( EH:Todo - whether and how can display this)
